short_summary: Library and Archives Canada offers Pre-Retirement Workshop Needs, for federal public servants and their spouses.
description: A virtual Commercial off the shelf (COTS) two-day workshop on Pre-Retirement Training for the Public Service Pension Plan.
duration_in_months: The contract will be for 12 months with optional extension for first 3 years. Issue timeframe not specified in the use case problem.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement for Pre-Retirement Workshops**

**Notice Title:** Request for Proposal: Pre-Retirement Workshops

**Reference Number:** CB-998-70438533
**Amendment Number:** 4
** Solicitation Number:** 5Z011-24-0140

**Publication Date:** October 18, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 28, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Contract Details:**

*   Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   Method: Competitive - Open bidding
*   Category: Service (SRV)
*   UNSPSC Code: 86132201 - Training workshop service
*   Trade Agreements: Applied to Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA); Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA); Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA); and others.
*   Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contract Requirements:**

*   Library and Archives Canada (LAC) is seeking a commercial off-the-shelf (COTS) two-day workshop on Pre-Retirement Training, which includes the Public Service Pension Plan, for federal public servants and their spouses.
*   The workshops will be delivered virtually in both English and French languages.
*   The contract will be for a period of one (1) year with the option for LAC to extend for a maximum of three (3) additional one (1) year periods.
*   There are no security requirements associated with this requirement.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The evaluation criteria for this RFP will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price. 

**How to Respond:**

*   Interested bidders should register on Buyandsell.gc.ca
*   Bidders are required to submit their proposal through the online procurement system
*   The RFP document is available online at Buyandsell.gc.ca

**For More Information**

*   Anne-Marie Aubry, 
receptiondesoumission-bidreceiving@bac-lac.gc.ca (613) 716-2173
